entry.title: We’ve filed a lawsuit challenging GitHub Copilot, an AI product that relies on unprecedented open-source software piracy.
entry.quote: By training their AI systems on public GitHub repositories (though based on their public statements, possibly much more) we contend that the defendants have violated the legal rights of a vast number of creators

entry.title: Decker
entry.quote: Decker is a multimedia platform for creating and sharing interactive documents, with sound, images, hypertext, and scripted behavior.

entry.title: Pieca: A Raspberry Pi Camera System for Leica M Mount Lenses
entry.quote: Based on the venerable Raspberry Pi4 and the High-Quality image sensor module it incorporates a 5-in touch screen with a live view and full manual controls. The camera uses the M mount system for attaching lenses. Allowing the camera to use a plethora of small manual lenses from Leica, 7Artisans, TTartisan, and other vintage lenses.

entry.title: Web inventor Tim Berners-Lee wants us to ‘ignore’ Web3: ‘Web3 is not the web at all’
entry.quote: Tim Berners-Lee, the computer scientist credited with inventing the World Wide Web, said he doesn’t view blockchain as a viable solution for building the next iteration of the internet.

entry.title: DALL·E API Now Available in Public Beta
entry.quote: Developers can now integrate DALL·E directly into their apps and products through our API. More than 3 million people are already using DALL·E to extend their creativity and speed up their workflows, generating over 4 million images a day.

entry.title: Welcome to The World's First RISC-V Site!
entry.quote: I'm hosting this site on a LicheePi, a RISC-V SBC (Single Board Computer) that costs only $26 USD.
